whyContents.headline: Watch Smarter, Not Longer!
otherHeadline: Get to the Point, Every Time!
Only the Essentials, No Extra Seconds Wasted!
Cut the Clutter, Enjoy the Core Content!
Maximize Your Time, Minimize the Watch!
whyContents.subheadline: Save Time, Take Better Notes, and Revisit Content Easily

why.description: Many YouTube videos share similar content. You shouldn't have to waste time watching the same information over and over again. We streamline your experience, providing you with unique and valuable insights without the repetition.

Videos are often designed for easy consumption, featuring openings, transitions, and sometimes entertaining but non-informative content. You don't need these fillers; you need the core information. We extract the essentials, giving you what truly matters.

Learning from videos can be effective, but also time-intensive. Our service focuses on highlighting the critical points, making learning faster and more efficient. We believe in empowering you with knowledge quickly, so you can learn and grow without delays.

featuresContents.headline: Transform Your Learning with AI
featuresContents.subheadline: Enhance your learning process with our innovative AI summarization. Gain quick access to critical information and make your video consumption more effective.

features.title: Low Cost, High Speed Transcription
features.description: Experience the power of advanced AI technologies that deliver fast and accurate speech-to-text and video-to-text services. Our platform supports various languages, offering low-cost solutions without compromising on speed or quality.
features.mobileDescription: Advanced AI delivers quick, accurate speech-to-text for multiple languages at a low cost.

features.title: YouTube Video Support
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with YouTube, allowing you to summarize and transcribe videos directly from the platform. Enjoy quick and easy access to insights from your favorite YouTube content.
features.mobileDescription: Summarize and transcribe YouTube videos effortlessly.

features.title: Upload Your Own Video/Audio
features.description: Whether it's a lecture, a meeting, or personal content, our service supports uploading your own video or audio files. Get precise transcriptions and summaries tailored to your specific needs.
features.mobileDescription: Get precise transcriptions and summaries for your own video/audio files.

features.title: Variety Summary Options
features.description: Choose from a range of summarization options to suit any requirement. From brief overviews to detailed summaries, our platform adapts to provide the level of detail you need.
features.mobileDescription: Choose from brief overviews to detailed summaries to fit your needs.

features.title: Save and Retrieve Content
features.description: Save your videos and easily retrieve the content by asking questions. Our intuitive search feature ensures you can find the exact information you need, whenever you need it.
features.mobileDescription: Save videos and find content easily with our search feature.

features.title: Easy Sharing
features.description: Share your summaries effortlessly with friends, colleagues, and teams. Enhance collaboration and communication by providing quick access to essential information.
features.mobileDescription: Share summaries with friends, colleagues, and teams for better collaboration.

pricingContents.headline: Pricing Plans
pricingContents.subheadline: Choose the plan that fits your needs and budget. Start saving time today!

plans.subheader: Pay as You Go, When You Need It.
plans.description:: Dive into the future of content summarization and transcription with Fusion AI Credits. Tailored for those who prefer flexibility, our credit-based plan lets you purchase exactly what you need. From concise YouTube summaries to comprehensive video transcriptions, every credit delivers precision. Choose between two seamless credit packs to fit your needs:
bullets: $5 for 200 Credits: Perfect for up to 200 hours of Quick Summarization or 6 hours of Transcription. Includes SRT Editor and Summary History.
$10 for 500 Credits: Ideal for up to 500 hours of Quick Summarization or 12 hours of Transcription. Also includes SRT Editor and Summary History.
plans.closing: Experience the elegance of choice without the commitment of a subscription.

featureList:
200 Credits on purchase 
 - up to 200 hours Quick summarization 
 - up to 6 hours video Transcription

500 Credits on purchase 
 - up to 500 hours Quick summarization 
 - up to 12 hours video Transcription

plans.description:: Elevate your professional workflow with the Fusion AI Professional Plan. Crafted for corporate excellence, this plan offers unlimited access to a suite of advanced features. Enjoy the luxury of limitless summarization, detailed insights, and transcription capabilities with 800 credits each month. Whether it's YouTube content or uploaded videos and audios, transform how you manage and consume information.
plans.closing: This plan is the ultimate tool for professionals who demand the best in content processing and efficiency.
features: Unlimited YouTube Quick and Detail Summaries
Comprehensive Transcription for Videos and Audios
800 Credits: Up to 800 hours of Quick Summarization, 400 hours of Detail Summarization, and 24 hours of Video Transcription
